pr_title: Added support to get blob tags

timeline.message: Added support to set access tier on a blob

timeline.bodyText: Should we return empty map or null here if there are no tags?
timeline.author: gapra-msft

replies.bodyText: We should probably bump the XMS_VERSION to the 73 version since gettags was not supported in 2019-02-02 I dont think
replies.author: gapra-msft

replies.bodyText: I would think an empty map, but there might be a guideline for this
replies.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: It looks like tagset will never be null from the generated code so I think this is fine?
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.author: rickle-msft

timeline.bodyText: Is there any way we can push this conversion into the intern method?
timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: I hesitate to do that cause if/when there is a generator for Android it will probably replace everything in the Impl file, so I want to keep it as "generated" as possible
replies.author: gapra-msft

replies.bodyText: Discussed offline, going to move this into a ModelHelper class
replies.author: gapra-msft

replies.bodyText: @rickle-msft Filled it in, Can you take another look?
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.message: Started setting up ways to get creds and clients
Added support for get container properties
Added a bunch of network tests for container apis
Added some more commit block list tests
Added Access condition tests for blob delete
